alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Fayette; Pickaway (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued February 27 at 3:31PM EST until February 27 at 4:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Fayette County in central Ohio... Northeastern Clinton County in southwestern Ohio... Northwestern Pickaway County in central Ohio... * Until 400 PM EST. * At 331 PM EST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sabina, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Washington Court House, Sabina, Williamsport, Bloomingburg, New Holland, Milledgeville, Deer Creek Lake, Derby, Bloomington, Jasper Mills, Reesville, Madison Mills, State Route 207 at US Route 22 and Pancoastburg. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central, southwestern and west central Ohio. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central, southwestern and west central Ohio.
